data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Chari-Baguirmi, Chad to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chari-Baguirmi, Chad
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Chari-Baguirmi. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Chari-Baguirmi, Chad today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 123,752 believers in Chari-Baguirmi that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Barma people. Make the Barma people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Chari-Baguirmi to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Chari-Baguirmi, Chad be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Chari-Baguirmi, Chad.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

location.name: Chari-Baguirmi
